alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:06PM EDT until May 09 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Black Jack, or 9 miles east of Greenville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, River Road, Blounts Creek, Shelmerdine, Calico, Cayton, Wilmar, Edward, Bunyan, Cox Crossroads, Bonnerton, Old Ford, Goose Creek State Park, Chocowinity and Washington Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
